response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for both of us. Given its exceptional quality and utility, I believe it's worth every penny of the $12,000 it represents to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the opportunity it presents, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to proceed with the purchase, you can secure this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a unique opportunity to own a piece that truly stands out. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 11000}
